title: DUI Task Force to Conduct Sobriety Checkpoint in Fort Washington
body:
Prince George’s County, Maryland… The Prince George’s
County Police Department’s Special Operations Division will be conducting a sobriety
checkpoint on Friday, March 16, 2012, from 9:00 p.m. to 3:00 a.m. in the 8300 block of Indian Head Highway in Fort Washington.For more information, contact the Prince George's County
Police Department’s Media Relations Division at (301) 772-4710.
Posted by


Prince George's County Police


at
